Name: Super Kick Off
About the game: Originally released in the early 1990s, Super Kick Off was an enhanced version of Kick Off developed for a variety of consoles. Now, relive those days in this remastered emulated version. Contains the versions developed for Nintendo Game Boy, Nintendo Super NES, Sega Game Gear, Sega Master System, and Sega Mega Drive. Includes 40 teams (16 national and 24 club), with the ability to edit everything from the team name and kit designs to the names and appearances of the players. Lead your team to victory in a variety of game modes, from friendlies, to leagues and cups at every level from domestic to international. This enhanced version introduces a number of modern features to this retro classic, including: Saving/loading the game at any point Support for most modern game controllers Full control remapping Image scaling and smoothing options
